headline: A Look At Cadence Design Systems (CDNS) Valuation After Recent Share Price Cooling
summary: Why Cadence Design Systems (CDNS) is on investors’ radar today Cadence Design Systems (CDNS) continues to draw attention after recent trading left the stock about 6% lower over the past month and roughly 3% lower over the past 3 months. For investors following semiconductor and electronic design software, that pullback sits against a backdrop of annual revenue of US$5.30b and net income of US$1.11b, alongside double digit annual growth in both measures. See our latest analysis for Cadence...

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Cadence Design Systems (CDNS) After Strong Multi Year Share Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Cadence Design Systems at around US$301 per share looks expensive or reasonable, you are not alone. This article is all about what the current price might imply. The stock has seen mixed recent returns, with a 1.7% gain over the last 7 days, a 6.0% decline over 30 days, a 2.9% decline year to date, but a 20.3% return over 1 year and 53.4% and 137.9% over 3 and 5 years respectively. These moves are set against an ongoing focus on Cadence as a key player in...

headline: Cadence Design Systems, Inc. (CDNS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Cadence Design Systems, Inc. on Expanse Stocks’ Substack by Nikotes. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CDNS. Cadence Design Systems, Inc.’s share was trading at $299.46 as of February 13th. CDNS’s trailing and forward P/E were 77.18 and 37.74 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
